37.eng-name: The Book of Fighting [The Prohibition of Bloodshed]

hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Ubaidullah bin Abi Bakr said:"I heard Anas say: 'The Messenger of Allah [SAW] said: The major sins are: Associating others with Allah (Shirk), disobeying one's parents, killing a soul (murder) and speaking falsely
